What are the best hotels near Casa Lleo Morera?

HotelDescriptionLink 1. Mandarin Oriental, Barcelona The Mandarin Oriental, Barcelona is a 5 star hotel located about 0.1 miles east of Casa Lleo Morera and approximately a 1 min. walk. Recent travelers gave this hotel an avg. guest review rating of 4 out of 5. 4 /5 Guest Reviews 2. Hotel HCC Taber The Hotel HCC Taber is a pleasing 3-Star hotel located ~0.1 mi. west of Casa Lleo Morera and roughly a 1 minute stroll. Recent hotel guests gave this hotel a guest review score of 4/5. 4 /5 Guest Reviews 3. Renaissance Barcelona Hotel The Renaissance Barcelona Hotel is an in demand 5-Star hotel located approx. 0.1 miles northeast of Casa Lleo Morera and approx. a 1 minute walk. With a verified guest score of 4/5, this makes it one of the most desirable hotels close to Casa Lleo Morera. 4 /5 Guest Reviews 4. Petit Palace Museum The Petit Palace Museum is an in demand 4-Star hotel located approx. 0.2 miles south of Casa Lleo Morera and approx. a 3 minute walk. With a verified guest score of 4/5, this makes it one of the terrific properties close to Casa Lleo Morera. 4 /5 Guest Reviews 5. Majestic Hotel & Spa Barcelona The Majestic Hotel & Spa Barcelona is a favored 5-Star hotel located ~0.2 mi. northwest of Casa Lleo Morera and approx. a 3 minute walk by foot. Travelers gave this hotel an average guest review rating of 4/5. 4 /5 Guest Reviews
